description: Have you ever fancied waking up early before the city gets busy, then going for a walk and sketching many of London’s most iconic sights in just 1.5 hours? If yes, then join other fellow creatives for this untutored, friendly, social urban sketch event organised by EarlyMasterworks.com for The Open House Festival.

events.name: Urban Sketching with EarlyMasterworks.com
events.notes: Please be punctual. You can contact the host through whatsapp or Instagram DM if you are running late.

factsheet.heading: Urban Sketching the Morning London
paragraphs: Have you ever fancied waking up early before the city gets busy, then going for a walk and sketching many of London’s most iconic sights in just 1.5 hours?

If yes, then join other fellow creatives for this untutored, friendly, social urban sketch event organised by EarlyMasterworks.com for The Open House Festival. We will take our time to walk and talk along the Thames River while sketching the iconic landmarks and cityscapes of London. Whether you're a seasoned urban sketcher or just starting out, this event is perfect for anyone who loves this beautiful city. Grab your sketchbook and pencils, and prepare to capture the morning beauty of the city on paper.

Don't worry if you're not a pro; this event focuses on having a good time and unleashing your creativity. So come along alone or with friends, meet fellow art and architecture enthusiasts, and spend a morning immersed in the art of drawing. Let us celebrate London together!

location.address: Constance Fund fountain of Diana immediately outside the Green Park U
travel_info:
Additional travel info: Starts at 'The Scoop' next to 'Old London City Hall'.
Ends at the 'Sir Winston Churchill statue' next to 'Big Ben'.

name: Life Drawing for All
